testcase.classname: To signup in the application and send mail
testcase.name: To register in the application
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to "http://elearningm1.upskills.in/".........................passed When Signup link is available...............................................passed And we click on signup link.................................................passed When Registration page appears..............................................passed Then we pass "Anu" in first name field......................................passed And pass "Suresh" in last name field........................................passed And enter "test5@gmail.com" in email field..................................passed And pass valid "AnuAnu5" in username field..................................passed And we give a valid "Dec@2020" in password field............................passed And we confirm the "Dec@2020" in confirm password field.....................passed Then click register.........................................................passed When we are in confirmation page............................................passed And we click on Profile button..............................................passed Then validate if profile name is "Anu Suresh"...............................passed Then click on Homepage......................................................passed And once Profile menu appears...............................................passed Then click on Compose.......................................................passed Given we are on compose message page........................................passed Then enter the "naveen" in send to field....................................passed And type a "test only" in subject field.....................................passed And type the "mailmessage" in message field.................................passed And click send message button...............................................passed Then check if confirmation message is displayed.............................passed
